track.name: Slow Show
comments: This song introduced me to The National, and it's still my favourite song of them [3]
No one can ever know how much I love this song. No one +_+
This song introduced me to The National, and it's still my favourite song of them [2]

“This is called “Slow Show”. Don’t..don’t play it at your weddings cause…it references my dick”
—	 Matt Berninger, on stage for the National, before playing “Slow Show”
I find this song so romantic. Definitely one of my favourites of all-time. [2]
To me, this song is about guilt, I think he regrets cheating on someone he really loves, and he is wondering how to tell her.
Can I get a minute of not being nervous and not thinking of my dick
This was the first dance at our wedding :)
I find this song so romantic. Definitely one of my favourites of all-time.
i wanna hurry home to you, put on a slow dumb show for you...and crack you up.

tag.name: you know i dreamed about you for 29 years before i saw you
